name: webpack-s3-plugin
description: Uploads compiled assets to s3 after build

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src/s3_plugin.js > dist/s3_plugin.js
scripts.patch: npm run dist && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run dist && npm version minor && git push && npm publish

author: Mika Kalathil
